duties_responsibilities.duty: Work steel efficiently and accurately to build a level and plumb building in a fast-paced environment.
Raise, position, align, and connect columns, beams, and other structural members to complete structural framing.
Rigging signaling and bolt up structural members.
Read Erection and Shop Drawings and fabricate structural members in the field.
Install stairs, guardrails, and grab rails, and perform plumbing of structural steel.
Use gridlines and benchmarks to complete layout, and operate powered hand tools, forklifts, and aerial working platforms.
Maintain safety 100% of the time, pass internal random safety audits, and enforce required PPE for all team members.
Operate a variety of tools including tape measures, wrenches, hammers, levels, and more, as well as maintain tool list requirements.
Utilize fall protection and safety equipment, signal cranes, connect steel, and operate powered hand tools, forklifts, and aerial working platforms.
